branch_steps: Open airway using jaw thrust prepare suction.
Consider plastic airway. Give 15 litres/min. Oxygen via free flow mask.
Treat traumatic injuries. Keep warm with blankets.
Open airway using head tilt chin lift. Prepare suction.
Consider plasitc airway. Give 15 litres/min oxygen via free flow mask.
Place in recovery position and keep warm with blanket.

notes: If at any point you cannot maintain the airway in an injured patient - choose life over limb and use head tilt / chin lift or the recovery position.
Place pregnant casualties on their left side.
Have suction ready to hand if carried and be ready to clear airway.
Consider use of glucose gel applied to gums for 'illness'.
Trasport head up if head or brain injury.
Transport level if diving illness related.
